item.description:
BIKE RIDE ON THE NORWOTTUCK RAIL TRAIL BETWEEN NORTHAMPTON AND AMHERST
TC: Dan (413) 203-1643 (no calls after 10) drdanprice@hotmail.com

EVENT: Come to the beautiful Pioneer Valley for a spring bike ride on the Norwottuck Rail Trail between Northampton and Amherst. We?ll ride for approximately 25 level miles and enjoy lunch in one of Amherst?s many yummy eateries. Optional walking tour and dinner in Northampton will follow. A helmet is a must.
RSVP: To Dan Required by April 25, rain cancels
MEET: 11AM. Meetup location will be given when you RSVP. I will pass along contact info for those coming from the Boston area who wish to carpool.
COST: $5 for non-MOSAIC members + money for lunch
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to the events coordinator to Enroll and get the details, TC: Dan (413) 203-1643 (no calls after 10) drdanprice@hotmail.com
item.why: Just read what it says below and I think you will find plenty of good reasons to sign up

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: BIKE RIDE ON THE NORWOTTUCK RAIL TRAIL
